templateData.itemlore1:
sbpet,,eerie:Eerie Pet,1,&7[Lvl 1 » 100] &fEerie
&8Combat Pet

&7Speed: &a+0.1 » +10
&7Intelligence: &a+0.5 » +50

&6Fearnesy
&7&7&5Fear &7from &5Great Spook Armor &7in
&7your &bwardrobe &7applies to you<nowiki>,</nowiki> even
&7if you aren't wearing it.
